scripts.start: npm run watch-less & budo src/main.coffee:dist/build.js --no-debug --live --port 3000 -- -t coffeeify
scripts.watch-less: nodemon --watch src --watch src -e less --exec 'npm run build-less'
scripts.build: browserify -t coffeeify src/main.coffee > dist/build.js && lessc src/main.less dist/build.css
